text: Breaking Glass is a 1980 British musical movie directed by Brian Gibson and starring Phil Daniels, Hazel O'Connor, Jon Finch, Jonathan Pryce, Peter Hugo- Daly, Mark Wingett, Mark Wing-Davey, Derek Thompson, Nigel Humphreys, Jim Broadbent, Richard Griffiths. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 musical movies Category:British musical movies Category:Movies directed by Brian Gibson Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Breaking Glass (movie)
